DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility acceptability two different intervention aim improve health outcome among patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) , high risk CKD progression . Specifically , study examine best implement provider-level intervention ( access CKD-registry ) patient-oriented intervention ( automate telephone self-management ( ATSM ) + health coach ) patient health outcome , 2x2 factorial design .
DOC.criteria: Patients CKD ( define estimate Glomerular Filtration Rate < 60ml/min/1.73m2 proteinuria consistently 3 month ) speak English , Spanish Cantonese primary care provider Kidney transplant recipient ; pregnant woman ; individual eGFR < 15 ml/min/1.73 m2 ; prevalent dementia ; impaired cognition severe mental illness ; expect life expectancy < 6 month ; phone access ; selfreported hearing impairment ; severe visual impairment prevent use touchtone telephone keypad ; nonstudy language
